description: Physiotherapy services for Corrections Service of Canada institutions in Quebec Region. Service correctionnel du Canada seeks to obtain physiotherapy services for executing essential physiotherapy treatments on offenders. Contractor must provide clinical physiotherapy treatment to offenders and collaborate with host facility health services team. Physiotherapy service is required at all Correctional Service of Canada institutions in Quebec Region.
